text:
="preserve">Daniel Paul Fredinburg (September 8, 1981 – April 25, 2015) was an American engineer and Google executive. He was a product manager and head of privacy at Google X. He was born in Mission Viejo, California. From January 2013 to February 2014, he dated actress Sophia Bush.
Fredinburg died on Mount Everest in an avalanche caused by the April 2015 Nepal earthquake. He was 33.
